channel.title: Products on PrestaShop Tests
channel.description: Recent content in Products on PrestaShop Tests

item.title: Filter And Quick Edit Products
item.description: Steps Step Description Expected result go to Catalog>products page Title page contains ‘Products •’ Reset all filters and get number of products Total of products > 0 Filter product by product id Criteria : Min ‘1’ Max: ‘3’ Number of products < Total of products All products id are between 1 and 3 Reset filters Number of products = Total of products Filter product by product name

item.title: Sort and pagination Products
item.description: Steps Step Description Expected result Go to products page Page title contains ‘Products’ Sort by id_product desc table is sorted by id_product desc (3 -> 2 -> 1) Sort by name asc table is sorted by name asc (a -> b -> c) Sort by name desc table is sorted by name desc (c -> b -> a) Sort by reference asc table is sorted by reference asc (a -> b -> c) Sort by reference desc table is sorted by reference desc (c -> b -> a) Sort by name_category asc table is sorted by name_category asc (a -> b -> c) Sort by name_category desc table is sorted by name_category asc (c -> b -> a) Sort by price (Tax exclud) asc table is sorted by price (Tax exclud) asc (1 -> 2 -> 3) Sort by price (Tax exclud) desc table is sorted by price (Tax exclud) desc (3 -> 2 -> 1) Sort by sav_quantity asc table is sorted by sav_quantity desc (1 -> 2 -> 3) Sort by sav_quantity asc table is sorted by sav_quantity desc (3 -> 2 -> 1) Sort by id_product asc table is sorted by id_product desc (1 -> 2 -> 3) Create 3 products from BO 3 Products are created Change Display items to 20 There are two pages Click on Next The Second page is displayed Click on Previous The first page is displayed Change Display items to 50 Pagination = 1 Delete the Created products Products are well deleted

item.title: Preview Product
item.description: Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Catalog > Products page The Product list page is displayed Reset all filters Number of products = total products Filter products by Name Number of products < Total products All products name contains the Searched Name Click on the drop-down toggle and click on Preview The FO > Products details page is displayed and the product name = searched name

item.title: Duplicate Product
item.description: Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Catalog > Products page The Product list page is displayed Reset all Filters Number of products = Total of products Filter by Product Name Number of products < Total of products All products contains the searched Name Click on the drop-down toggle and click on Duplicate An alert “Product successfully duplicated.

item.title: Delete product from list
item.description: Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Catalog > Products page The Products page is displayed Reset all filters Number of products = Total of products Filter Products by Name Number of products < Total of products All the products contains the searched Name Click on the drop-down toggle, click on “Delete” and confirm the deletion An alert “Product successfully deleted.

item.title: BO - Product list page - Bulk actions - Enable & Disable
item.description: Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Catalog > Products page The Product list page is displayed Reset all Filters Number of products = Total of products Filter by Product Name Number of products < Total of products All products contain the searched Name Click on the drop-down toggle and click on Disable An alert “Product(s) successfully deactivated.

item.title: BO - Product list page - Delete Bulk actions
item.description: Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Catalog > Products page The Product list page is displayed Reset all Filters Number of products = Total of products Filter by Product Name Number of products < Total of products All products contain the searched Name

item.title: Product V2 Page - Create & Edit a Product
